text: Gavere () is a municipality located in the Belgian province of East Flanders. The municipality comprises the towns of Asper, Baaigem, Dikkelvenne, Gavere, Semmerzake and Vurste. On January 1, 2006, Gavere had a total population of 12,004. The total area is 31.35 km² which gives a population density of 383 inhabitants per km². thumbnail|none|Borgwal Castle in Vurste (2007) ==Sports== The Superprestige Gavere is a November cyclo-cross race held in Gavere, Belgium, which is part of the Superprestige. == Military == The Air Traffic Control center of the Belgian Air Component is based in Semmerzake. == See also == * Lamoraal van Egmont, Prince of Gavere ==References== ==External links== * * Official website * Webpage at Reocities * Webpage at Internet Archive Category:Municipalities of East Flanders
title: Gavere
